segments.text: Should I tell EDD that I have found a job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is this a temporary job or something more permanent ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When you get your next Continued Claim Form , you should just write down where you worked and note that you no longer need unemployment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I take a short job and then get laid off , will I be starting over trying to get unemployment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just because you work for a week doesn â€™ t mean that you will be losing your benefits .
segments.speaker: S2
